category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_import_transfer_optionset
preference.preference_description: Defines the default option for International Material Data System (IMDS) files import into Teamcenter. A valid value is the name of a "Transfer Option Set", which can be found in the "PLM XML Import Export Administration" application.
